subSections.title: Etymology
subSections.text:
First mentioned in the ''{{w|Book of Han}}'' {{defdate|1st century {{CE}}}}, in the description of the "specialties" from the {{och-l|烏弋山離|tr=*ʔˤa lək srar raj|Alexandria}} country in the {{w|Western Regions}}. The country referred to is likely "{{w|Alexandria Prophthasia}}", which was part of the {{w|Parthian Empire}} during the time of Han, speaking an Indo-Iranian language.

Compare {{cog|pal|šgl|tr=šagr, šēr|t=lion; (astronomy) Leo}}, {{cog|kho|sarau||lion}}. Related to {{och-l|狻猊}}.
